def checkRecord(n):
    mod = 10 ** 9 - 7
    dp = [[0, 0, 0] for _ in range(n + 1)]
    dp[0] = [1, 1, 0]
    dp[1] = [2, 2, 1]
    for i in range(2, n + 1):
        dp[i][0] = sum(dp[i - 1]) % mod
        dp[i][1] = (dp[i][0] + dp[i - 1][1]) % mod
        dp[i][2] = (dp[i][1] + dp[i - 1][2]) % mod
    return (sum(dp[-1]) * 2 - dp[-1][0]) % mod

    dp = [[0, 0, 0] for _ in range(n + 1)]
    dp[0] = [1, 1, 0]
    dp[1] = [2, 2, 1]
    for i in range(0, n + 1):
        dp[i][0] = sum(dp[i - 1]) % mod
        dp[i][1] = (dp[i][0] + dp[i - 1][1]) % mod
        dp[i][2] = (dp[i][1] + dp[i - 1][2]) % mod
    return (sum(dp[-1]) * 2 - dp[-1][0]) % mod
